verses.verse: Gather yourselves <S%H7197>together,<s%> <S%H7197>yes,<s%> gather together, you <S%H1471>nation<s%> that has no <S%H3700>shame,<s%>

before the <S%H2706>appointed<s%> <S%H3205>time<s%> when the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> as the <S%H4671>chaff,<s%> <S%H3808>before<s%> the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> on <S%H3117>you,<s%> before the day of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> comes on <S%H935>you.<s%>

<S%H1245>Seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all you <S%H6035>humble<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> who have <S%H6466>kept<s%> his <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> <S%H6038>humility.<s%> It may <S%H194>be<s%> that you will be <S%H5641>hidden<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H639>anger.<s%>

For <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> will be <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation.<s%> They will drive <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> will be rooted <S%H6131>up.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2256>coast,<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> of the <S%H3774>Cherethites!<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is against <S%H3667>you,<s%> Canaan, the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H3427>you,<s%> that there will be no inhabitant.
The <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2256>coast<s%> will be <S%H5116>pastures,<s%> with <S%H3741>cottages<s%> for <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

The <S%H2256>coast<s%> will be for the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> They will find <S%H7462>pasture.<s%> In the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> they will lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> will <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H7725>them,<s%> and restore <S%H7622>them.<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H2781>insults<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> with which they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> themselves against their <S%H1366>border.<s%>

Therefore as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> surely <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will be as <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> as <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> a <S%H4476>possession<s%> of <S%H2738>nettles,<s%> and salt <S%H4379>pits,<s%> and a <S%H5704>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolation.<s%> The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H962>plunder<s%> <S%H3499>them,<s%> and the survivors of my <S%H1471>nation<s%> will inherit <S%H5157>them.<s%>

This they will have for their <S%H1347>pride,<s%> because they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> themselves against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be <S%H3372>awesome<s%> to <S%H7329>them,<s%> for he will famish all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Men will <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H376>him,<s%> everyone from his <S%H4725>place,<s%> even all the <S%H339>shores<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
<S%H1992>You<s%> Cushites <S%H1992>also,<s%> you will be <S%H2491>killed<s%> by my <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

He will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> as <S%H6723>dry<s%> as the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H5739>Herds<s%> will lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H2416>her,<s%> all the animals of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> Both the <S%H6893>pelican<s%> and the <S%H7090>porcupine<s%> will <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in its <S%H3730>capitals.<s%> Their <S%H6963>calls<s%> will <S%H7891>echo<s%> through the <S%H2474>windows.<s%> <S%H2721>Desolation<s%> will be in the <S%H5592>thresholds,<s%> for he has laid <S%H6168>bare<s%> the cedar <S%H731>beams.<s%>

This is the <S%H5947>joyous<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H983>carelessly,<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%> in her <S%H3824>heart,<s%> "I <S%H657>am,<s%> and there is none besides <S%H8047>me.<s%>" How she has become a desolation, a place for <S%H2416>animals<s%> to lie down <S%H4769>in!<s%> Everyone who passes <S%H5674>by<s%> her will <S%H8319>hiss,<s%> and <S%H5128>shake<s%> their <S%H3027>fists.<s%>
